metadata.title: CVE-2022-31056 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package, Data centermanagement, ITIL Service Desk, licenses tracking and software auditing. Inaffected versions all assistance forms (Ticket/Change/Problem) permit sqlinjection on the actor fields. This issue has been resolved in version10.0.2 and all affected users are advised to upgrade.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
